question: A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her.Write a letter to this friend. In your letter tell your friend about the job and what sort of working involves. say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her. Explain how to apply for the job.
text: Hi, How are you? What's up? I hope everything is fine.
I'm writing this letter because last day I found out that our local company need some accounting, and you told me you've been looking for a new opportunity, so I thought that is a dream job for you.

I remember we studied accounting at university together and always you were a top student in all of the courses and now you have a master's degree in accounting. Also, you have  good business sense and good communication skills. absolutely, I remember you learnt everything very fast. Moreover, Persian is your mother-tough but you can speak English and France very frequently.
I recommended you  make a strong resume and sent it to me. After that, I print it and send it to our local company. I know you have a high chance to get this job.
If there are any questions, please call me.
